title: gradle clean failed

comments.body: PS: i feel the problem in "com.github.hierynomus.license" , please help me
@xkli  can you give a proxy?   email
Sorry, I don't have proxy, I recommend you remove this plugin.
@xkli  I recommend weex remove this plugin in master.

body:
in directory D:\weex\android\playground\app ， i execute gradle clean ， failed！
i hope weex can used same version build-tools，at playground and sdk
